summary.span: Fornece suporte para ferramentas XAML da WPF (Windows Presentation Foundation).

span.span: Provides support for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) XAML tooling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks As classes de suporte a esse namespace o [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infraestrutura e são não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.The classes in this namespace support the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and are not intended to be used directly from your code.
